date_of_follow_up_entered.name: date_of_follow_up_entered
date_of_follow_up_entered.prettyName: Date of follow-up consult in clinic

date_of_lab_report_entered.name: date_of_lab_report_entered

date_reported_to_family_entered.name: date_reported_to_family_entered
date_reported_to_family_entered.prettyName: Date reported to family (e.g. by phone)

interpretation.name: interpretation
interpretation.values: NA= |pathogenic=Pathogenic|likely_pathogenic=Likely Pathogenic|variant_u_s=Variant of Unknown Significance|likely_benign=Likely Benign|benign=Benign|investigation_n=Investigation Needed

status.customDisplay: {{velocity}} #macro (_addVariantStatus $prefix $name $value) #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') {{html wiki="false" clean="false"}}<input type="hidden" id="${prefix}${name}" name="${prefix}${name}" class="variant-status-value" value="$!{value}"/>${value}{{/html}} #else {{html wiki="false" clean="false"}}$escapetool.xml($services.localization.render("PhenoTips.CPGeneVariantClass_status_${value}")){{/html}} #end #end ## ## #if ($prefix && $name) #if("$!{variantStatus}" == "")## #set($variantStatus = $!{value})## #end## #_addVariantStatus($prefix, $name, $variantStatus) #end {{/velocity}}
status.name: status

subject.customDisplay: {{velocity}} #macro (_addVariantSubject $prefix $name $value) #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') {{html wiki="false" clean="false"}}<input type="hidden" id="${prefix}${name}" name="${prefix}${name}" class="variant-subject-value" value="$!{value}"/>${value}{{/html}} #else {{html wiki="false" clean="false"}}$escapetool.xml($services.localization.render("PhenoTips.CPGeneVariantClass_subject_${value}")){{/html}} #end #end ## ## #if ($prefix && $name) #if("$!{subject}" == "")## #set($subject = $!{value})## #end## #_addVariantSubject($prefix, $name, $subject) #end {{/velocity}}
subject.name: subject
